description: The 30,000-square-foot Sprouts Farmers Market, located in the new Decatur Crossing Shopping Center, opened Wednesday in DeKalb County.
title: PHOTOS: New Sprouts Farmers Market is open in DeKalb
title_page: PHOTOS: New Sprouts Farmers Market is open in DeKalb
text:
The new Decatur Sprouts Farmers Market is open.
The 30,000-square-foot grocery store, located in the new Decatur Crossing Shopping Center, opened Wednesday. On the corner of Scott Boulevard and North Decatur Road near the city, it is situated near new apartments and a brunch place called First Watch. The restaurant is opening “soon,” according to the sign.
Some scenes from Day 3 of Sprouts:
Sprouts Farmers Market is open on Scott Boulevard near Decatur in DeKalb County. (JOSHUA SHARPE/AJC)
